SELECT usm.survey_id, usm.survey_time -- 用户问券调查 FROM entity_purchse_main epm LEFT JOIN user_entity_mapping uem ON uem.entity_id = epm.entity_no LEFT JOIN user_survey_main usm ON usm.user_id = uem.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND epm.cates = 2 AND epm.is_active = 1 AND epm.is_terminated = 0 AND usm.is_active = 1
AND uem.user_id = #{params.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(usm.survey_time , '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y')
AND DATE_FORMAT(usm.survey_time , '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{params.startDate} , '%Y-%m')
ORDER BY usm.survey_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT survey_id, user_id, survey_time, edit_time, is_active FROM user_survey_main
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.userId}, '%')

SELECT usm.survey_id, usm.user_id, usm.survey_time, slt.`name`, usi.question_id, usi.answer_detail, usi.remarks FROM user_survey_main usm LEFT JOIN user_survey_items usi on usm.survey_id = usi.survey_id LEFT JOIN sys_linkage_type slt on usi.question_id = slt.nid where usm.user_id = #{params.userId} and usi.question_id like CONCAT('%', #{params.type}, '%')
SELECT count(*) from user_survey_main where user_id=#{userId}
